channel.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
channel.description:
Hey,
A lot of people saw it happen last night, and if you saw it, you were shocked. Every single RuneScape server was taken completely offline. I mean, Everything. You couldn't change your pass, log on regular rs, log on rsc, view highscores, go on the forum, make a new character, not even send a complaint. Well, I was smart enough to take some pics. I started wondering what could have possibly done this. Other than the main server in cambridge got shut off for some reason, or my theory, a mass, planned, ddos attack. I could be wrong, but what ever. Here's the pics:
[URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816514]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816514[/URL]- This is my first pic, just a pic of the worlds, all at zero. [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816515]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816515[/URL]- Front page proclaiming there's 0 people playing, that's a keeper. [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816516]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816516[/URL]- Another worlds pic, I mean every world was offline... [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816517]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816517[/URL]- German servers are no exception =p [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816518]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816518[/URL]- Sorry for this, another world pic, but it tells you that world 1 and 2 are the best. [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816519]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816519[/URL]- Don't know why I bothered posting, just rs telling me server is down. [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816520]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816520[/URL]- RSC is off =/ [URL=http://www.badongo.com/pic/816521]http://www.badongo.com/pic/816521[/URL]- Couldn't even complain...
Yeah, now you have my rsn, idk, I don't cheat. Anyways, leave feedback, what do u think happened?

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included

runescape.com -> Forums
Quick find code: 14-15-287-47679240

Theres explanation what happened by jagex

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @the_outcasted_user the outcasted user
item.description:
@the_outcasted_user wrote:

[quote=“moparsc4p3, post:32, topic:123459”][quote]As anybody playing earlier today (Sunday 15 July) will have noticed, there have been some technical problems with the RuneScape game worlds going offline earlier today.

This outage was caused by a complete loss of internet connectivity at the ISP which provides our core hosting. We had one complete outage earlier, and then a second one which has just ended.

What caused these problems the ISP hasn’t yet told us, but this sort of thing is normally caused by a router somewhere dieing.

Because this outage was caused by a 3rd party fault at our ISP it’s somewhat out of our control. It wasn’t a problem with any of our servers. However we are taking the following immediate steps.

  1. When the outage occurred we weren’t even able to tell our users what was going on, because our news posting system is at the same facility! We are now updating our webserver software so we can at least put an explanatory message up if this sort of thing happens.

  2. We are updating our core loginserver software so it handles outages of this nature better. Of course if our main servers can’t talk to the internet you still won’t be able to play, but we think we can at least stop an outage of that type causing a 15 min rollback. Which should make it less annoying.

  3. Obviously we will be chasing the ISP for an explanation of exactly what happened, and making it clear to them how unhappy we are about this, and pressuring them for assurances of what they are doing to make this less likely to happen again.

We have someone in the office now working overtime on Sunday afternoon, making the changes for 1+2.

Please accept our sincere apologies for these problems. I’m finding them as frustrating as you are!

Thanks for you patience
Andrew
[/quote][/quote]

thort they wouldnt have all there core servers in 1 place
should have 1 or 2 around the place

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Denial-of-service attack

In computing, a denial-of-service attack (DoS attack) is a cyber-attack in which the perpetrator seeks to make a machine or network resource unavailable to its intended users by temporarily or indefinitely disrupting services of a host connected to the Internet. Denial of service is typically accomplished by flooding the targeted machine or resource with superfluous requests in an attempt to overload systems and prevent some or all legitimate requests from being fulfilled. In a distributed denia...

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @moparsc4p3 moparsc4p3
item.description:
@moparsc4p3 wrote:

As anybody playing earlier today (Sunday 15 July) will have noticed, there have been some technical problems with the RuneScape game worlds going offline earlier today.

This outage was caused by a complete loss of internet connectivity at the ISP which provides our core hosting. We had one complete outage earlier, and then a second one which has just ended.

What caused these problems the ISP hasn’t yet told us, but this sort of thing is normally caused by a router somewhere dieing.

Because this outage was caused by a 3rd party fault at our ISP it’s somewhat out of our control. It wasn’t a problem with any of our servers. However we are taking the following immediate steps.

  1. When the outage occurred we weren’t even able to tell our users what was going on, because our news posting system is at the same facility! We are now updating our webserver software so we can at least put an explanatory message up if this sort of thing happens.

  2. We are updating our core loginserver software so it handles outages of this nature better. Of course if our main servers can’t talk to the internet you still won’t be able to play, but we think we can at least stop an outage of that type causing a 15 min rollback. Which should make it less annoying.

  3. Obviously we will be chasing the ISP for an explanation of exactly what happened, and making it clear to them how unhappy we are about this, and pressuring them for assurances of what they are doing to make this less likely to happen again.

We have someone in the office now working overtime on Sunday afternoon, making the changes for 1+2.

Please accept our sincere apologies for these problems. I’m finding them as frustrating as you are!

Thanks for you patience
Andrew

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Buzzy:

Lol. Honestly, I’m not into cracking, I have a life away from the keyboard. But I know what a ddos attack is, and how it works. I thought maybe, because a distributive denial of service attack brings things offline, why couldn’t this be it?

Yes, you would have to bring every single of the 100+ worlds down. Not to mention if MITB has a firewall for this, I’m sure RS has a better one. And RS worlds are designed to handle much more serverload. How often does RS get pinged with data whenever you are logged on? Multiply that by 1000 per server on a good day.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“r00nboi, post:18, topic:123459”]There is a currently a problem with the Runescape Login Server which is preventing users from logging into the game. Andrew Gower has posted the following on our forum due to the inability to access his news posting service because of the outage.
"Our core hosting facility has lost it’s internet connection. We are (urgently!) talking to the ISP now. When this sort of thing happens it’s normally because a router somewhere has died, so hopefully it won’t take them too long to fix, but since it’s a fault with a 3rd party system, now we’ve let them know all we can do is wait (and keep nagging them every 10 mins, heheh) Please be patient, and we’re sorry for the inconvenience. Thanks Andrew![/quote]
link to that please?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @r00nboi r00nboi
item.description:
@r00nboi wrote:

There is a currently a problem with the Runescape Login Server which is preventing users from logging into the game. Andrew Gower has posted the following on our forum due to the inability to access his news posting service because of the outage.
"Our core hosting facility has lost it’s internet connection. We are (urgently!) talking to the ISP now. When this sort of thing happens it’s normally because a router somewhere has died, so hopefully it won’t take them too long to fix, but since it’s a fault with a 3rd party system, now we’ve let them know all we can do is wait (and keep nagging them every 10 mins, heheh) Please be patient, and we’re sorry for the inconvenience. Thanks Andrew!

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:123461”]Looool wtf happend out there???
Yesterday i was playing all night long and nothing similar to this happend…lol…

(off topic) How the hell do you get the IRC or i dont know beside you’re RS thingy i really want to know!!

O and i believe that No1 Can DDOs runescape…You think a couple of Cmd will hurt runescape??

Dont even think about it ;)[/quote]

You honestly believe that could be done pinging some server with 32 bytes?

If it was a DDoS, I would say the person(s) used quite an amount of slaves to get all their hits.

Hell, I’ve noticed a new rat released recently, that with enough time, will give you the functionality necessary.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Got Ddosed? Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:14, topic:123459”][quote author=Kulkka link=topic=173082.msg1598150#msg1598150 date=1184520646]

I assume it’s the fault of a system administrator since I was playing about 2 hours ago. Think about it, apart from the remote servers, everything is functioning normally(except for a few things), a new admin might have messed something up, then again.

That’s a good theory, and I don’t think they’ll post if that was it. No major company is gonna want to admit they fucked up. lol. it’s funny as hell, something else happened. One of the guys I was cooking with told me when he logged back on, he had 186k raw monkfish and some change, I didn’t believe him till I saw it. Lucky bastard

Extremely lucky bastard lol.
[/quote]
i dont understand? Why was he lucky :S[/quote]
He got 186k raw monkfish from nowhere.
